otherNames: Ryoko's Case File, 薬師寺涼子の怪奇事件簿
synopsis:
Based on a series of light novels written by Tanaka Yoshiki. The story revolves around Ry?ko Yakushiji, a brilliant 27-year-old elite investigator with the Tokyo Metropolitan Police. Together with her subordinate Junichir? Izumida, the two often investigate bizzare and supernatural cases.
In addition with the paranormal, Ry?ko also has a longstandi… more Based on a series of light novels written by Tanaka Yoshiki. The story revolves around Ry?ko Yakushiji, a brilliant 27-year-old elite investigator with the Tokyo Metropolitan Police. Together with her subordinate Junichir? Izumida, the two often investigate bizzare and supernatural cases. In addition with the paranormal, Ry?ko also has a longstanding rivalry with Yukiko Muromachi, another talented police investigator.
